metadata.Title: CVE-2023-41915 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high.
metadata.Description:
OpenPMIx PMIx before 4.2.6 and 5.0.x before 5.0.1 allows attackers to obtain ownership of arbitrary files via a race condition during execution of library code with UID 0.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-41915` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpmi1-pmix - 2.1.1~rc1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libpmi2-pmix - 2.1.1~rc1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libpmix2 - 2.1.1~rc1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: pmix package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.1~rc1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
